description: Avoid headaches this tax season! In this course, Alicia demonstrates 7 easy steps to prepare your QuickBooks data to get ready to hand your records off to your accountant to file taxes. Learn how to reconcile your accounts, spot errors and fix them, adjust inventory, depreciate your assets, analyze your business, close the books, and make a backup copy of your QuickBooks file. This is a recording of a live webinar with business owners just like you.
title: Year-end QuickBooks Procedures
